metadata.feature_description: Search and retrieve site pages for URL management operations

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Retrieve all pages without search filter

steps.action: Navigated to SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: TEST URL tab should load with Page to Test dropdown
steps.actual: TEST URL tab loaded successfully with Page to Test dropdown showing '<None Specified>'

steps.action: Clicked on Page to Test dropdown to expand the page list
steps.expected: Dropdown should show all site pages
steps.actual: Dropdown expanded showing all 23 site pages with a search box and hierarchical page list including Home, Our Products, Activity Feed, Admin, Groups, etc.

steps.expected: Page list should filter to show only pages containing 'Test'
steps.actual: Page list filtered successfully from 23 to 14 results, showing pages like Test Page One, Test Normal Page, Publish Test Page, Workflow Test Page, etc.

steps.action: Selected 'Test Page One' from the filtered results
steps.expected: Page should be selected and dropdown should close
steps.actual: Test Page One was selected successfully, dropdown closed, and Test URL button became enabled

steps.action: Clicked Test URL button to verify page selection works
steps.expected: URL should be generated for the selected page

observations: The Site Pages Search feature is implemented as a page picker dropdown within the SEO > URL Management > TEST URL functionality
The page picker displays pages in a hierarchical tree structure with expand/collapse controls
Search filtering is case-insensitive and matches partial text in page titles
The result count is displayed at the bottom of the dropdown (e.g., '23 Results' or '14 Results' when filtered)
